verses.english: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
verses.hausa: Idan rãna aka shafe haskenta

verses.english: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
verses.hausa: Kuma idan taurãri suka gurɓãce (wani ya shiga a cikin wani).

verses.english: And when the mountains are removed
verses.hausa: Kuma idan duwãtsu aka tafiyar da su.

verses.english: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
verses.hausa: Kuma idan rãƙuma mãsu cikunna aka sakẽ su wãwai, bã ga kõwa ba.

verses.english: And when the wild beasts are gathered
verses.hausa: Kuma idan dabbõbin dãji aka tattara su.

verses.english: And when the seas are filled with flame
verses.hausa: Kuma idan tẽkuna aka mayar da su wuta.

verses.english: And when the souls are paired
verses.hausa: Kuma idan rãyuka aka haɗa su da jikunkunansu.

verses.english: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
verses.hausa: Kuma idan wadda aka turbuɗe ta da rai aka tambaye ta.

verses.english: For what sin she was killed
verses.hausa: "Sabõda wane laifi ne aka kashe ta?"

verses.english: And when the pages are made public
verses.hausa: Idan takardun ayyuka aka wãtsa su (ga mãsu su).

verses.english: And when the sky is stripped away
verses.hausa: Kuma idan sama aka fẽɗe ta.

verses.english: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
verses.hausa: Kuma idan Jahĩm aka hũra ta

verses.english: And when Paradise is brought near,
verses.hausa: Kuma idan Aljanna aka kusantar da ita.

verses.english: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
verses.hausa: Rai ya san abin da ya halartar (a rãnar nan).

verses.english: So I swear by the retreating stars -
verses.hausa: To, ba sai Na yi rantsuwa da taurãri matafã ba.

verses.english: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
verses.hausa: Mãsu gudu suna ɓũya.

verses.english: And by the night as it closes in
verses.hausa: Da dare idan ya bãyar da bãya.

verses.english: And by the dawn when it breathes
verses.hausa: Da sãfiya idan ta yi lumfashi.

verses.english: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
verses.hausa: Lalle ne shi (Alƙur'ãni) haƙƙan, maganar wani manzon (Allah) ne mai girma ga Allah.

verses.arabic: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.english: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
verses.hausa: Mai ƙarfi, mai daraja a wurin Mai Al'arshi.

verses.english: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
verses.hausa: Wanda ake yi wa ɗã'a (wato shugaban malã'iku) ne a can, amintacce.

verses.english: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
verses.hausa: Kuma abokinku ba mahaukaci ba ne.

verses.english: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, yã gan shi a cikin sararin sama mabayyani.

verses.english: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
verses.hausa: Kuma shi, ga gaibi bã mai rowa ba ne.

verses.english: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
verses.hausa: Kuma shi (Alƙur'ani) bã maganar shaiɗani, wanda aka la'ana, ba ce.

verses.english: So where are you going?
verses.hausa: Shin, a inã zã ku tafi?

verses.english: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
verses.hausa: Lalle ne shi (Alƙur'ãni), bã kõme ba ne fãce gargaɗi ga talikai.

verses.english: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
verses.hausa: Ga wanda ya so, daga cikinku, ya shiryu.

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã zã ku so ba sai idan Allah Ubangijin halitta Yã yarda.
